data.actual_result: It plays in a loop when you hover over it.
data.expected_result: It doesn't play unless you click the play button.
data.short_description: Videos from gyazo without a .gif or .mp4 extension at the end of the URL causes the video to play in a loop when you hover over it though it has a play button.
data.steps_to_repro: - Hover over a link from gyazo posted in a channel without a file extension at the end of it
